spec.name: Petit Poucet Restaurant
spec.description: Petit Poucet Restaurant (Le Petit Poucet) is one of Casablanca's most historic and legendary café-restaurants, dating back to **1920**. Located in the central Art Deco district, it has served as a famous meeting place for intellectuals, journalists, artists, and political figures throughout the French Protectorate and post-independence eras. The establishment is renowned for its long history, classic ambiance, and traditional French or international menu.
